long_description: Want to watch a movie while lying in your tent? The Big Agnes Entertainment Center Loft clips into loops included in Big Agnes tents to let you use a tablet or other device inside the tent. Water-resistant case with clear screen helps keep your device dry and secure. Adjustable case fits most devices; easily adjusts from 12 x 8.5 in. (30.5 x 21.5cm) down to approximately 8 x 8.5 in. (20 x 21.5cm). Hooks and adjustable straps let you set up your personal theater wherever you go. Mesh speaker pocket doubles as cord stash pocket. The Big Agnes Entertainment Center Loft comes with a carry/hang loop.
short_description: Want to watch a movie while lying in your tent? The Big Agnes Entertainment Center Loft clips into loops included in Big Agnes tents to let you use a tablet or other device inside the tent.
